<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fearsome Brute](/Feats.aspx?ID=402) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 151 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Fear makes your foes weak and more vulnerable to your attacks. You gain a circumstance bonus to damage rolls for Strikes against [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) creatures. The bonus is equal to double the target's frightened value.

 If you have master proficiency in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7), increase the bonus to triple the target's frightened value.
name: Fearsome Brute
